Sentencas: The highly phase-pure perovskite electrolyte, La(0.9)Sro(0.1)Ga(0.8)Mg(0.115)Co(0.085)O(2.85) (LSGMCO), was prepared by means of glycine-nitrate process (GNP) for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs).
Titulo: Combustion synthesis and properties of highly phase-pure perovskite electrolyte Co-doped La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O2.85 for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: The perovskite phase evolution, sintering, electrical conductivity and electrochemical performance of LSGMCO were investigated.
Titulo: Combustion synthesis and properties of highly phase-pure perovskite electrolyte Co-doped La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O2.85 for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: The results show that the highly phase-pure perovskite electrolyte LSGMCO can be obtained after calcining at 1150 degrees C.
Titulo: Combustion synthesis and properties of highly phase-pure perovskite electrolyte Co-doped La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O2.85 for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: The sample sintered at 1450 degrees C for 20 h in air exhibited a better sinterability, and the relative density of LSGMCO was higher than 95%.
Titulo: Combustion synthesis and properties of highly phase-pure perovskite electrolyte Co-doped La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O2.85 for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: The stoichiometric indexes of the elements in the sintered sample LSGMCO determined experimentally by EDS were in good agreement with the nominal composition.
Titulo: Combustion synthesis and properties of highly phase-pure perovskite electrolyte Co-doped La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O2.85 for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: The electrical conductivities of the sample were 0.094 and 0.124 S .
Titulo: Combustion synthesis and properties of highly phase-pure perovskite electrolyte Co-doped La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O2.85 for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: cm(-1) at 800 degrees C and 850 degrees C in air, respectively.
Titulo: Combustion synthesis and properties of highly phase-pure perovskite electrolyte Co-doped La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O2.85 for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: The ionic conduction of the sample was dominant at high temperature with the higher activation energies.
Titulo: Combustion synthesis and properties of highly phase-pure perovskite electrolyte Co-doped La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O2.85 for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: While at lower temperature the electron hole conduction was predominated with the lower activation energies.
Titulo: Combustion synthesis and properties of highly phase-pure perovskite electrolyte Co-doped La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O2.85 for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: The maximum power densities of the single cell fabricated with LSGMCO electrolyte with Ce0.8Sm0.2O1.9 (SDC) interlayer, SmBaCo2O5+x cathode and NiO/SDC anode achieved 643 and 802 mW cm(-2) at 800 degrees C and 850 degrees C, respectively.
Titulo: Combustion synthesis and properties of highly phase-pure perovskite electrolyte Co-doped La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O2.85 for IT-SOFCs
